articles.title: German factory prices surge to record high as energy crisis deepens - live updates - The Telegraph
articles.description: German factories suffered record cost increases in July as the energy crisis squeezing Europe piled more pressure on its largest economy.
articles.content:
Good morning.
Government borrowing has exceeded forecasts as surging inflation drives up the costs of servicing debt.

articles.title: Women's 4x400m relay storm into final while superb Shanahan advances in 800m - The42

articles.title: UN chief meets Zelenskyy in Ukraine, voices concerns about Russian-held nuclear plant - CBC News
articles.description: The United Nations chief and the presidents of Turkey and Ukraine discussed ways on Thursday to end Kyiv's conflict with Russia and secure Europe's largest nuclear power station, which has come under shelling at the front lines.
